Blacknightmare::

Blacknightmare stopped and looked at Kitkat, her eyes had an strange 
bright "Yes it's weird"said Blacknightmare"I saw you leave the 
Blackfortress and I saw you come back minutes later... How can you 
explain that??? Who's that robot that seems look like you??? and the 
most important how can I be sure that I'm not speaking with a spy-
clone made by Alliance???... ANSWER ME!!! Tell me something that the 
true Kitkat can know and not Alliance... "


 
> ::KitKat2::
> 
> "A mistake led me to believe it was one of ours. Something was weird
> though. No one stopped me it was like they knew me. Eventually I 
got out
> and got back here. That on must have followed me."
